hedline.hl1: Zipping Along at the Indy 500 From the Comfort of Home

abstract.p: ExciteatHome enables Web site to show dashboard of Eddie Cheever's super-sleek car as he competes in Indianapolis 500 on Memorial Day; photo (M)

block.p: If simply watching the Indianapolis 500 on television this Memorial Day isn't enough, the Net is offering a virtual seat behind the wheel.
Excite@Home has enabled a Web site (sports.excite.com) to show the dashboard of Eddie Cheever's super-sleek car as he races around the track at more than 220 miles per hour.
If simply watching the Indianapolis 500 on television this Memorial Day isn't enough, the Net is offering a virtual seat behind the wheel.
Excite@Home has enabled a Web site (sports.excite.com) to show the dashboard of Eddie Cheever's super-sleek car as he races around the track at more than 220 miles per hour.

The race car, which beams telemetry to Mr. Cheever's trackside crew, will be seen on home computers as a 3-D model. A mouse click on parts of the car will display information like tire pressure and oil temperature.
Before the race, online viewers can also get a driver's-eye view of a lap around the speedway on www.indy500.com/multimedia.
MICHEL MARRIOTT
